languages.text: {n}Вглядываясь в лик дворянина, вы понимаете, что натянутая на нитях кожа — его собственная. Ни шрамов, ни швов... Похоже, таким способом он просто подправляет неудачные черты лица, подражая более знатным вельможам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вглядываясь в лик дворянина, вы понимаете, что натянутая на нитях кожа — его собственная. Ни шрамов, ни швов... Похоже, таким способом он просто подправляет неудачные черты лица, подражая более знатным вельможам.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вглядываясь в лик дворянина, вы понимаете, что натянутая на нитях кожа — его собственная. Ни шрамов, ни швов... Похоже, таким способом он просто подправляет неудачные черты лица, подражая более знатным вельможам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Peering at the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

{n}Peering at the nobleman's face, you do not see a single curve that even vaguely resembles the attacker's features.{/n}

{n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细打量着眼前这个贵族的脸。尽管他的脸被拉长了，但那其实就是他自己的脸，上面没有任何疤痕或缝线。看来，他这么做仅仅是在模仿地位较高的贵族，让自己看起来更加尊贵。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细打量着眼前这个贵族的脸。尽管他的脸被拉长了，但那其实就是他自己的脸，上面没有任何疤痕或缝线。看来，他这么做仅仅是在模仿地位较高的贵族，让自己看起来更加尊贵。{/n}

languages.text: {n}貴族の顔を覗き込むと、その突っ張った皮膚が本人のものであることに気づいた。傷跡も縫い目も見当たらない。どうやらこれは、見た目を良くし、高位の人物を真似るための手段にすぎないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族の顔を覗き込むと、その突っ張った皮膚が本人のものであることに気づいた。傷跡も縫い目も見当たらない。どうやらこれは、見た目を良くし、高位の人物を真似るための手段にすぎないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mirando la cara del noble, ves que la piel estirada es suya. No tiene cicatrices ni puntadas, por lo que parece ser su forma de mejorar su aspecto, imitando a gente de un estatus más elevado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirando la cara del noble, ves que la piel estirada es suya. No tiene cicatrices ni puntadas, por lo que parece ser su forma de mejorar su aspecto, imitando a gente de un estatus más elevado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soylunun suratına baktığında gerilmiş derisinin kendisine ait olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Yara izi veya dikiş izi göremiyorsun. Görünüşe göre bu, yalnızca daha iyi görünmek ve daha yüksek statüdeki insanları taklit etmek için yaptığı bir şey.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soylunun suratına baktığında gerilmiş derisinin kendisine ait olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Yara izi veya dikiş izi göremiyorsun. Görünüşe göre bu, yalnızca daha iyi görünmek ve daha yüksek statüdeki insanları taklit etmek için yaptığı bir şey.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'examen du visage du noble vous révèle que la peau étirée est bien la sienne. Vous ne distinguez ni cicatrices ni points de suture. Il semblerait qu'il s'agisse uniquement de sa manière d'améliorer son apparence en imitant les personnes de statut plus élevé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'examen du visage du noble vous révèle que la peau étirée est bien la sienne. Vous ne distinguez ni cicatrices ni points de suture. Il semblerait qu'il s'agisse uniquement de sa manière d'améliorer son apparence en imitant les personnes de statut plus élevé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du das Gesicht des Adeligen musterst, erkennst du, dass die gedehnte Haut seine eigene ist. Du siehst keine Narben oder Stiche. Offenbar ist das seine Art, sein Aussehen zu verbessern und Leute von höherem Rang zu imitieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Peering into the nobleman's face, you realise that the stretched skin is his own. You see no scars or stitches. It appears this is merely his way of improving his looks and imitating people of higher standing.{/n}
